code: import{loadUsers}from"./loadUsers";export var loadDeleteUser=function loadDeleteUser(_ref){var id=_ref.id;return function(dispatch){var options={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json;charset=utf-8"},body:JSON.stringify({deleteUser:"delete from peoples where id = ".concat(id,";"),hideUser:"update peoples set bdel = true where id = ".concat(id)})};fetch("http://localhost:4000/deleteUser",options).then(function(res){return res.text();}).then(function(data){dispatch(loadUsers({userId:localStorage.userId/1}));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
